ProjectTitle: Regulation of extracellular proteolysis by microglia and brain-infiltrating macrophages during neuroinflammation
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/04/2023
Metadata: your instruments and databases may generate metadata that you may use, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Preservation: please note that the preservation time for clinical research data is now 25 years, for other data the KU Leuven RDM policy asks 10 years of preservation
Sharing: have you considered any repositories for data sharing already, EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) has many for life sciences data and KU Leuven has its own general repository RDR, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
